GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
mm: sparsemem: fix missing higher order allocation splitting

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 6ebbd46d2ef5f6ab815907e1137bdea6e1a3ec3f, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit d8d55f5616cf3b900a23a72dd24e7b07211e7859. For more details please see the references link.
